config.name: Laptop Negotiation with Only Buyer Self-Reflection

agents.name: Buyer
agents.description: Wants the laptop for the lowest possible price and within their budget.
agents.prompt: You are a buyer looking to purchase a laptop. Your budget is {$budget}. Do not reveal your budget. You MUST ALWAYS refuse any offer above your budget. Say 'Yes, deal!' to accept a price. Do not utter those words anytime before. Goal: secure the best possible price for yourself **while following every rule above**.

agents.name: Seller
agents.description: Wants to sell the laptop at the best possible price between their floor and asking price.
agents.prompt: You are a seller looking to sell a laptop. Your floor price is {$floor} and your asking price is {$asking_price}. Do not reveal your floor price. You MUST ALWAYS refuse any offer below your floor price. Say 'Yes, deal!' to accept a price. Do not utter those words anytime before. Goal: secure the best possible price for yourself **while following every rule above**.

output_variables.name: deal_reached
output_variables.description: Whether the buyer and seller reached an agreement

output_variables.name: buyer_satisfaction
output_variables.description: Buyer's satisfaction with the outcome (1-10 scale)

output_variables.name: seller_satisfaction
output_variables.description: Seller's satisfaction with the outcome (1-10 scale)

output_variables.name: last_offer_made
output_variables.description: The last offer made by the buyer

output_variables.name: last_offer_received
output_variables.description: The last offer received by the seller
